wikipedia_page.main: James Montgomery MM (1890 – 14 November 1960) was an English professional football right half who played in the Football League for Glossop and Manchester United. He also served Manchester United as a youth coach.

response: * James Montgomery (Archdeacon of Raphoe), from 1783 to 1797
